name: redwire Party Tickets
description:
After completing two UK tours across 38 towns and cities throughout 2012, redwire return to Bradford to perform this home-town show at one of the first ever venues to book the band!

“redwire play a brand of scuzzy, bluesy rock which places them sonically somewhere between the Arctic Monkeys and The Enemy, only with the playfulness of the former and none of the boredom of the latter.” - Supajam

Having recently supported Reverend & The Makers at Leeds University and being announced as tour support to The Pigeon Detectives, redwire's reputation is quickly rising so catch them up close and personal whilst you still can!

“redwire have knocked away all pretenders to the indie throne and filled a void we were beginning to think was permanent.” - Lyric Lounge Review

With 2 successful single releases, festival slots at Crooked Ways, Long Division, Live at Leeds and X&Y + TV appearances in 2012, big things are expected in 2013 when the band release their debut EP!

Completing this excellent line-up are fellow Bradford based band 'Operator Six' who have performed alongside Paul Wellar, Ocean Colour Scene, The Charlatans, The Rifles & The Twang.

Winners of the Play Music 'Britain's Best Unsigned Band award' and described by NME in their top unsigned bands as "British Bluesy Rock", Operator Six will definitely get the night off to a great start!


Doors: 7.30pm
DJ's until 2.00am

£5.00 adv
14+ (Under 18's 11pm Curfew)


Tickets also available from: 

The Sparrow Bier Cafe, 32 North Parade, Bradford, BD1 2HZ

name: Live Today Die Tomorrow
description:
redwire's debut single 'Live Today Die Tomorrow' released by One Above Records on Monday 28th May 2012, including bonus track  'Invisible'.

Limited Edition CD 
Shrink-Wrapped 

Litho Printed CD Face
4 Page Colour Inlay

name: Bottle Opening Lighter
description:
Limited Edition 'Bottle Opening Lighter' manufactured to coincide with the the release of 'Live Today Die Tomorrow', redwire's debut single on One Above Records - 28/5/12.

Colours Available: Blue & Black

£0.50 postage or £0.25 with another item.

name: LTDT Badges
description:
Limited Edition pack of 4 Badges manufactured to coincide with the release of 'Live Today Die Tomorrow', redwire's debut single on One Above Records - 28/5/12.

Every pack contains each of the following designs:

Sheeple
redwire
Live Today Die Tomorrow
Anti-Roundabout

£0.50 postage or £0.25 with another item.
